Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: 3D honeycomb network structure with a channel diameter of about 11 Å

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate varied
Other Information.Additional Info: Separation resolution increased with loading cycles of MOF-74 on γ-Al2O3

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate varied
Other Information.Additional Info: Separation resolution increased with loading cycles of MOF-74 on γ-Al2O3

Sieving Mechanism: Chemical affinity quantum sieving effect due to unsaturated Ni2+ metal open sites

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Resolution up to 2.21, separation time 10.29 min for 3-MOF-74(Ni)@γ-Al2O3

Other Information.Additional Info: MOF-74(Ni) loading amount controlled by changing cycle times (n), 8.13% in 3-MOF-74(Ni)@γ-Al2O3

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate 30 mL/min, injection volume 100 µL
Other Information.Additional Info: Composite C showed highest resolution of 2.87 with separation time of 7.15 min

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate 30 mL/min, injection volume 100 µL
Other Information.Additional Info: Composite C showed highest resolution of 2.87 with separation time of 7.15 min

Sieving Mechanism: Combination of chemical affinity quantum sieving and spatial shielding effect

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Best resolution 2.87, separation time 7.15 min for C-S1/S2/S3/3-MOF-74(Ni)@γ-Al2O3

Other Information.Additional Info: Na2Cr2O7, Na2CrO4, and NaCl coexisted in final form, prepared with different amounts of CrO3

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate 20 mL/min, injection volume 100 µL
Other Information.Additional Info: Optimal mass ratio NaCl/Na2CrO4 = 0.7:1 showed resolution 2.56, separation time 5.91 min

Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, carrier gas flow rate 20 mL/min, injection volume 100 µL
Other Information.Additional Info: Optimal mass ratio NaCl/Na2CrO4 = 0.7:1 showed resolution 2.56, separation time 5.91 min

Sieving Mechanism: Combination of chemical affinity quantum sieving and optimized component ratio

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Resolution 2.56, separation time 5.91 min for optimal NaCl/Na2CrO4 ratio

Other Information.Additional Info: Synthesized with different mass ratios of NaCl and Na2CrO4, optimal ratio determined as 0.7:1
